Class Process

java.lang.Object
com.swiftfox.model.Process
public final class Process extends Object
Represents a process in the CPU scheduling simulation. Each process has a unique PID and contains attributes relevant to scheduling algorithms.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Process.State
    Represents the possible states of a process during the simulation lifecycle.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty
    remainingTime
    Returns the JavaFX property that reflects the remaining time, enabling UI bindings for updates.

  • Property Details

    • remainingTime

      public javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty remainingTimeProperty
      Returns the JavaFX property that reflects the remaining time, enabling UI bindings for updates.
      See Also:
      • getRemainingTime()
      • remainingTimeProperty()

  • Constructor Details

    • Process

      public Process(String name, int arrivalTime, int burstTime, int priority)
      Constructs a new Process with a specific name, arrival time, burst time, and priority.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the process
      arrivalTime - the time at which the process arrives in the system
      burstTime - the total CPU time required by the process
      priority - the priority of the process (lower number may indicate higher priority)

    • Process

      public Process(String name, int arrivalTime, int burstTime)
      Constructs a new Process without a specified priority (defaults to 0).
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the process
      arrivalTime - the time at which the process arrives
      burstTime - the total CPU time required

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(int timeUnits)
      Executes the process for a given number of time units. Reduces the remaining time and updates the process state if it finishes.
      Parameters:
      timeUnits - the number of time units to execute

    • preempt

      public void preempt()
      Preempts the process if it's running and not finished. Sets its state to READY.

    • resetCounter

      public static void resetCounter()
      Resets the static process ID counter. Useful for restarting simulations.

    • getPid

      public int getPid()
      Returns the unique process ID.

      the process ID
